channel.title: Simple recipes
channel.description: Simple recipes is a website I made as a hobby project to learn HTML and CSS and also to catalog and organize my favorite recipes I collected over the years.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Updated the 88x31 button design and added a link to my other website.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Changed the design a bit (yes, AGAIN) and rewrote the landing page text slightly so it sounds better (hopefully).

item.title: Website update
item.description: Updated the code of the website and purchased a domain. ✨

item.title: Website update
item.description: Updated the RSS feed format and website's own update feed. If you notice any weirdness with the RSS feed, clear your reader's cache and unsubscribe & resubscribe.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Added photos! Most recipes now have a picture of the food in question.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Minor layout changes and cleaned up and optimized the code.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Redid my RSS feed a bit! Nothing major but, if you want to see changes, you can unsubscribe and resubscribe and don’t forget to clear your reader’s cache! Also, I converted all my recipe files to Markdown and I love it so much more than working with HTML because it’s so much more readable, but that’s beside the point and doesn’t really matter for the end user (you!).

description.p: A salad recipe that’s pretty popular in Russia.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Fixed a ton of minor grammatical errors and typos. Google docs and VSCode LTeX+ to the rescue!
